About the Company: Sunteck Realty Ltd is engaged in real estate and construction of residential projects.The company has set-up two international standard Corporate Business Centers at Bandra Kurla Complex, the largest Commercial Business District (CBD) of Mumbai city:Sunteck Centrako and Sunteck Certainty.The group extended their plan to diversified real estate product lines i.e. Residential, Commercial, Retail, Hotels, Entertainment Parks and so on.Some of their upcoming projects are-Suntech Sion,Suntech Hubli Shopping Mall,Multiplex and Hotel,International project include 2 High end residential projects and 1 mixed use township at premium locations in Muscat, etc.
